text: Environmental Modifiers are mechanics that change the environment and how Plants and Zombies interact with it.
$(br2)There are many types of Environmental Modifiers, here's a list of all of them:
$(br)Solar Winds
$(br2)Solar Winds convert Plant Food that lands on them into Petal Plant Food or Sun
$(br2)Plant Food, Mushroom PF, and Tough PF convert to 1 Petal PF
$(br)Air PF and Elec PF convert to 2 Petal PF
$(br)Cold PF and Blazing PF convert to 3 Petal PF
$(br)Aquatic PF converts to 1 Large Sun
$(br)Petal PF converts to 3 Large Suns
$(br2)Crater Tile
$(br2)Craters prevent non-flying plants from being planted on them.
$(br2)They can be removed by right clicking them with a Sun.
$(br)Scorched Tile
$(br)They prevent non-flying Plants, Plants not immune to Fire, and Plants that are not icy or watery from being able to be planted on them.
Using an Iceberg Lettuce on them will destroy them. Ice or Water attacks that damage the field (e.g. Ice-shroom, Chilly Pepper, etc.) destroy them.
Planting icy or watery Plants on top of them instantly destroys them.
They last for 1 minute. They spawn an Imp Dragon Zombie every 18 seconds.
$(br)Snow Tile
$(br2)They prevent non-flying Plants and Plants that are not icy or fiery from being able to be planted on them.
$(br)Fire attacks that damage the field (e.g. Jalapeno, Cherry Bomb, etc.) destroy them.
$(br)Planting Pepper family Plants on top of them instantly destroys them. Pepper Plants emit heat around them that destroys the tiles.
$(br2)They last for 2 minutes.
$(br)Ice Tile
$(br2)They apply Chill to non-flying Zombies that are close to them.
$(br)They are destroyed by fire attacks that damage the field (e.g. Cherry Bomb, Jalapeno, etc.).
$(br2)They last for 2 minutes.
$(br)Water Tile
$(br)Allows Aquatic Plants to be planted on them, and gives Amphibious Plants their underwater attributes.
$(br)They apply Wet to non-flying Zombies that are close to them.
$(br)They are destroyed by fire attacks that damage the field (e.g. Cherry Bomb, Jalapeno, etc.).
$(br)Planting Pepper family Plants on top of them instantly destroys them. Pepper Plants emit heat around them that destroys the tiles.
$(br)They last for 20 seconds, unless a Plant is on them.
$(br)Oil Tile
$(br)When a Zombie steps on it, it Stuns them for 5 seconds and slides them forward by about 2 blocks. Unless it's on fire.
$(br)Covered and Machine Zombies don't slide.
$(br)Gets set on fire inside the warm radius of a Plant, a fire projectile goes over it, hit by fire splash or some explosions, or when a Zombie on fire is near it.
$(br)When on fire, it makes a Fire Trail with double the original duration over it.
$(br)Gold Tile
$(br2)Gold Tile produces one Small Sun every 3 minutes if there's a non-flying Plant on top of them. They can only produce sun if a Zombie is 10 blocks away from it.
$(br2)They can be removed by right clicking them with a Gold Shovel.
$(br)Spring Tile
$(br2)When a Zombie steps on it, it slightly Bounces them back and it vanishes.
$(br2)They last for a few seconds.
$(br)Banana Peel
$(br)When a Zombie steps on it, it Stuns them for 10 seconds, inflicts damage based on it's weight, and slides them forward by about 3 blocks.
$(br)Covered Zombies aren't affected by the Stun and don't slide.
$(br2)The weight depends on the Zombie's size, gear weight, and materials, and won't work on Machines.
$(br2)They last for 1 minute or until a Zombie steps on it.
$(br)Withered Marigold Pile
$(br2)Can stack up to 3. When a Zombie steps on it, it loses a stack.
$(br2)When a Zombie steps on it, it will receive a status effect that slows and weakens it for 10 seconds.
$(br2)They last for 1 minute or until they lose all stacks.
$(br)Obstacle
$(br2)Destroys Plants close to it. Takes damage, shielding zombies behind. They are Heavy. Gravebusters eat them.
